record.title: 2019 Open Box True GDM-49F Glass Door Merchandiser Freezer with LED Interior Lighting
record.body_html:
The GDM-49F-HC is a 54-1/8" wide, ENERGY STAR certified two-section insulated and self-contained refrigerated freezer merchandiser from True. This freezer comes in a black powder coated steel exterior. There are 2 triple-pane thermal glass hinged doors on this ENERGY STAR certified two-section insulated and self-contained refrigerated freezer merchandiser. The freezer also has LED interior lighting.

This ENERGY STAR certified two-section insulated and self-contained refrigerated freezer merchandiser has 8 adjustable, heavy duty, PVC coated wire shelves and it has a white interior. This unit also comes with a stainless steel floor for easier cleaning. The entire cabinet of this ENERGY STAR certified two-section insulated and self-contained refrigerated freezer merchandiser has foamed-in-place, high density, polyurethane insulation. The self-contained refrigeration on this ENERGY STAR certified two-section insulated and self-contained refrigerated freezer merchandiser uses environmentally friendly R290 hydrocarbon refrigerant which has zero ozone depletion potential (ODP).

record.title: Advance Tabco KSLAG-240 30" x 24" 16 ga Work Table w/ Undershelf & 430 Series Stainless Steel Top, 5" Backsplash
record.body_html:
Advance Tabco KSLAG-240 Description

The Advance Tabco KSLAG-240 work table has a top surface that is reinforced and kept level by two galvanized hat channels. It is constructed of 430 series, 16-gauge stainless steel, making it durable and rust resistant. Because higher gauge metals are thinner than lower gauges, the 430 series stainless steel has little nickel content and doesn't resist corrosion as well as 300 series stainless steel; however, it is great for extending countertops. The 5-inch backsplash on the rear contains spills and messes to keep walls clean. For safety, a rolled rim on the front eliminates sharp edges.

The table's square bend sides enable it to be placed flush against equipment and walls. The top has been sound deadened to reduce noise while in use. Two galvanized hat channels reinforce the top surface to ensure it remains level, and welded gussets provide support to the hat channels. The 18-gauge undershelf can be adjusted, and it's secured by aluminum die-cast clamps instead of nuts and bolts. To keep the Advance Tabco KSLAG-240 work table level on uneven ground, bullet feet on the stainless steel legs are adjustable.

Product Details

  • 16-ga., 430 series stainless steel top
  • 18-ga. stainless steel adjustable undershelf
  • 7-cu.-ft. maximum undershelf storage space
  • 15⁄8-in.-dia. stainless steel legs
  • Stainless steel bullet feet adjust
  • Top is sound deadened to limit noise
  • 5-in. rear backsplash protects walls from stains
  • 15⁄8-in. rolled rim for safety
  • 15⁄8-in. square sides for placement against walls and other equipment
  • 2 galvanized hat channels are stud-welded under top for reinforcement
  • Aluminum die-cast clamp attaches legs to shelf
  • TIG welded and polished to match nearby surfaces
  • Overall dimensions: 30 in. W x 24 in. D x 40.5 in. H

record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam 1000-BQ2/128 Description

Transporting plated food from the kitchen to banquet serving areas, the Alto-Shaam 1000-BQ2/128 Halo Heat banquet cart has a large, 128-plate capacity. Wire shelves hold the food, and depending on the application, they can accommodate plates, Gastronorm pans, or banquet trays. Unique heating technology gently surrounds the food and keeps it warm; it doesn't need water, moisture pans, or canned fuel to maintain product temperatures.

The Alto-Shaam 1000-BQ2/128 heated banquet cart is mounted on 6-inch-diameter casters, and because two casters swivel and two are rigid, the cart moves smoothly in a straight line and maneuvers around corners. Operators can steer the unit with transport handles, while the built-in bumpers prevent the cabinet from leaving dents and scratches on other surfaces.

Product Details

  • Part of the Alto-Shaam EcoSmart initiative
  • 4 chrome-plated wire shelves
  • Can hold (128) 10-in. plates
  • Accommodates covered or uncovered plates, half-size or full-size Gastronorm pans, and banquet trays
  • Halo Heat technology uses a controlled, uniform heat source to gently surround food, warming it without diminishing quality
  • Doesn't require water, moisture pans, or canned fuel
  • Stainless steel interior and exterior resist rusting and denting
  • Solid, right-hinged door
  • Built-in handles for comfortable transport
  • Bumper around the perimeter protects other surfaces from damage
  • (2) 6-in. rigid casters and (2) 6-in. braking swivel casters

The Alto-Shaam 1000-BQ2/192 Halo Heat banquet cart is designed to move cooked, plated food from the back of the house to banquet halls. record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam 1000-BQ2/96 Description

School cafeterias, hospital kitchens, and banquet halls can use the Alto-Shaam 1000-BQ2/96 heated holding cabinet to keep food warm and ready to serve. The unit uses Halo Heat, a controlled heat source that warms food without changing its texture, taste, or appearance. This heat is distributed throughout the interior for consistent serving temperatures, and operators can adjust the level from 60 to 200 degrees Fahrenheit.

Once the desired level is set, the heat light comes on and the Alto-Shaam 1000-BQ2/96 banquet cart begins heating. After the cart reaches the desired level, the light goes off, signaling it is ready for food. The cabinet can adapt to most banquet holding applications, including covered plates, covered or uncovered plate carriers, and banquet service trays. However, in order to hold the trays and banquet carriers, additional shelving is needed. Because this cart comes with six-inch casters, transporting it is simple; it has side handles for steering and a bumper that prevents accidental wall marks.

The Alto-Shaam 1000-SK/II Halo Heat smoker oven enhances product flavor with smoke from wood chips. It includes six authentic wood chip samples and a 60-minute timer to regulate the smoke. Alto-Shaam 1000-TH Description

This Alto-Shaam 1000-TH cook-and-hold oven uses Halo Heat technology—a low-temperature system that radiates heat gently throughout the cabinet for cooking and holding. Because it maintains precise temperatures, it can improve food quality, extend hold times, and operate overnight to increase production. Its cooking temperature can be set between 200 and 325 degrees Fahrenheit and its holding temperature range is from 85 to 205 degrees Fahrenheit to accommodate various products. Operators can use its probe to sense internal product temperature, and when product falls within the programmed parameters, the oven converts from cook mode to hold mode automatically. Alto-Shaam 1000-TH/I-QS Description

The Alto-Shaam 1000-TH-I Halo Heat low-temperature oven can be used to reheat, cook, or slow roast foods. Its cook cycle runs on a timer, and when time runs out, the unit transitions to hold mode automatically, keeping food warm and ready to serve. For consistent product temperatures, heat is distributed throughout the cabinet compartments by Halo Heat technology that is specially designed to prevent shrinkage.

With two compartments, this Alto-Shaam 1000-TH-I cook-and-hold oven can hold eight full-size sheet pans total per oven. These compartments are controlled individually and separated by a layer of insulation to prevent heat transfer. Cooking and holding temperatures are programmable from the front using dials, while the timer is adjustable with arrow keys. Indicator lights signal when the unit heats up, cooks, or warms food. For cleaning, the cart is made of smooth stainless steel, and includes a drip pan and drip tray.

Alto-Shaam 1000-TH/II Description

The Alto-Shaam 1000-TH/II cook-and-hold oven uses Halo Heat® to regulate and maintain temperatures close to the user settings. Its digital control can detect small temperature changes, resulting in quick recovery times. With separate knobs for cook and hold, users can set the temperature for each mode. The time can be adjusted by arrow keys and a digital display on the front.

For user convenience, this Alto-Shaam 1000-TH/II cook-and-hold oven automatically switches to hold mode after cooking to keep food ready to serve. Its indicator lights show the active mode and another indicator signals when the unit heats up. This stainless steel unit features a single compartment with a magnetic door latch. It comes with two side racks with eight pan positions, three stainless steel wire shelves, a drip pan with a drain, and an external drip pan.

  • Drip tray and drip pan prevent puddles

record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam 1000-UP-QS Description

The Alto-Shaam 1000-UP heated holding cabinet can heat many food types, whether rolls, poultry, casserole, or potatoes. It also can function as a proofer, so dough can rise before it bakes in the oven. Its Halo Heat system evenly spreads heat throughout the cabinet, warming food without cooking it. Insulation traps heat inside the two sections and separates them, enabling two different foods to be warmed at one time. The temperature in each section can be adjusted by up and down arrow keys, and the current selection is viewable on the digital display screen.

After powering on, this Alto-Shaam 1000-UP food warming cabinet begins heating to the selected temperature. Because it is mounted on casters, this unit can be wheeled to the food and loaded. Eight full-size sheet pans fit onto the racks in each section. Users can then close the doors, which stay closed with magnetic latches.

Alto-Shaam 1100-RW-QS Description

The Alto-Shaam 1100-RW drop-in soup warmer heats 11 quarts of product using a pan insert that is sold separately. For delicate foods, the Halo Heat® system provides even heat that is unlikely to scorch product, and for dense products, the heat intensity can be turned higher. This unit has 10 different heat intensities, selectable with a single control knob.

Great for restaurants or buffet lines, this Alto-Shaam 1100-RW round drop-in warmer is made of durable stainless steel. Its remote control is connected to the unit by a watertight conduit. Because it uses a remote, the controls can be installed in an accessible area for staff or at a distance from buffet eaters. Insulation in the base traps heat in the well and prevents the counter from getting too hot.

record.title: Alto-Shaam 1200-TH  Cook and Hold Oven, 208-240v/1ph
record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam 1200-TH Description

Both cavities in the Alto-Shaam 1200-TH cook-and-hold oven accommodate eight 20-inch by 12-inch by 21⁄2-inch pans or (16) 10-inch by 12-inch by 21⁄2-inch pans. Each compartment is equipped with three wire shelves and two stainless steel side racks with 15 pan positions spaced on 17⁄16-inch centers. For uniform results, Halo Heat technology moves warm air gently through the cabinet without using fans or adding humidity that can impact food quality. This system generates heat between 200 and 325 degrees Fahrenheit for cooking, and for holding, it produces temperatures from 85 to 205 degrees Fahrenheit.

The Alto-Shaam 1200-TH cook-and-hold oven's simple controls are simple to navigate so operators can program recipes and adjust temperatures. For smooth operation, the probes check internal product temperature and convert the oven from cook mode to hold mode automatically once product’s internal temperatures fall within specific programmed parameters. Users can set the unit to cook product overnight to reduce labor and boost productivity. The pans are accessed directly for insertion and removal due to the cabinets' reach-in configurations. With its durable, corrosion-resistant stainless steel construction, this 229⁄16-inch-wide by 331⁄4-inch-deep by 7011⁄16-inch-high unit withstands heavy wear and can be moved for catering, servicing, and maintenance.

record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam 1200-TH-DLX Description

The Alto-Shaam 1200-TH-DLX cook-and-hold oven is equipped with deluxe touchscreen controls that enable operators to program recipes, manage temperatures, and collect HACCP data. Able to generate and maintain temperatures between 200 and 325 degrees Fahrenheit for cooking or 85 to 205 degrees Fahrenheit for holding, the Halo Heat system doesn't use fans or add humidity that can impact food quality. Because it produces relatively low temperatures, it can cook product overnight to reduce labor and boost productivity.

Both sections in the Alto-Shaam 1200-TH-DLX cook-and-hold oven accommodate eight full-size pans or 16 half-size pans, and each section has a 120-pound or 60-quart capacity. Three wire shelves stabilize the pans in place, while the compartments' reach-in configurations grant direct access for loading and retrieving product. When the doors are opened for short periods of time, the SureTemp heat-recovery system compensates for heat loss that could disturb ideal interior conditions. This heavy-duty, durable stainless steel full-height unit resists rust and corrosion for a lasting service life. Because it's fitted with 31⁄2-inch casters, the oven can be moved for maintenance, cleaning, and servicing as needed.

record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam 300-TH-DLX Description

This Alto-Shaam 300-TH-DLX cook-and-hold oven features deluxe programmable touchscreen controls that enable operators to manipulate temperatures, manage internal product temperatures, and program recipes. Its Halo Heat technology generates heat at a set level between 200 and 325 degrees Fahrenheit for cooking, while its holding temperature range can be adjusted between 85 and 205 degrees Fahrenheit. This system doesn't use fans, added humidity, or extremely hot heating elements to preserve food texture and quality. Warm air surrounds product gently to produce uniform results, and to reduce temperature changes when the door is open, SureTemp heat recovery compensates for heat loss. A straight, single-point probe can gauge product's internal temperature; if it falls within the programmed parameters, the unit switches automatically from cook mode to hold mode.

record.title: Alto-Shaam 500-TH SX 120V/1 Cook and Hold Oven with Simple Controls - 120V, 1900W
record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam 500-TH SX

Designed for smaller spaces and flexible placement under counters or other pieces of equipment, the 500-TH Cook & Hold oven helps you bring consistent quality to every dish you serve. Fangless, waterless Halo Heat® technology provides the greatest yields and highest quality food—all while lowering foodservice operating costs. This simple control low temperature cook-and-hold oven features an icon-based, touch control and a single knob to set temperatures, cook and hold times. Cook by time or a single temperature probe and store up to eight programmable recipes.

Maintain food quality and hold product at perfect serving temperatures with our commercial oven for hours without overcooking or drying out.

Cook and hold by time or by single temperature probe. The cook-and-hold oven senses internal product temperature or time and automatically converts from cook mode to hold mode once set parameters are reached.

Put product on display in our commercial oven for customers and kitchen staff with the glass door option.

Produce less food waste and minimize food costs with 15-20% less protein shrinkage compared to conventional cooking. Serve more portions from the same cut of meat to increase your profit margin.

No moving parts or added water in the cook-and-hold oven makes oven cleaning effortless. Simply remove oven shelves and wipe clean.

Save on energy costs with gentle, radiant Halo Heat technology. Our commercial cook-and-hold ovens cost less than $2 per day to operate.

Eliminate the need to manually log temperatures each hour. Optional HACCP data logger automatically tracks food temperature readings and operation mode by date and time – all downloadable onto a USB flash drive.

Made in the USA with a commitment to quality.

record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam 750-CTUS Description

Featuring two side racks, the Alto-Shaam 750-CTUS heated holding cabinet can hold six full-size sheet pans at once, and the racks are spaced 3 inches apart, leaving plenty of room for dishes. Food is heated by a fanless, Halo Heat system to help ensure it doesn't shrink or dry out. Employees can choose a temperature between 60 and 200 degrees with the control knob, and once at temperature, the unit's indicator light will turn off. The interior's current temperature level is displayed on an external gauge for convenient monitoring.

Because this Alto-Shaam 750-CTUS heated cabinet is constructed of strong stainless steel on the inside and outside, it resists scratching, denting, warping, and rusting. Its French doors are split down the middle and stay shut tight with their latching handles. Vents in the front give the user control over airflow and, when open, help prevent food sogginess.

The Alto-Shaam 750-TH/II-QS half-size cook-and-hold oven cooks at low temperatures for long periods of time using Halo Heat technology. record.title: Alto-Shaam 767-SK-QS  Commercial Smoker Oven  Cold Smoking, 120v
record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam 767-SK-QS Description

Great for cooking, roasting, retherming, and holding, the Alto-Shaam 767-SK-QS commercial smoker oven uses a controlled, uniform heating system to evenly cook food and hold it without shrinkage or moisture loss. Ideal when smoking cheese and fish, the unit can be used to cold smoke product. It accommodates 100 pounds of product at a time and can hold nine full-size, 21⁄2-inch-deep hotel steam pans.

The controls in this Alto-Shaam 767-SK-QS half-size cook and hold smoker oven are designed for simplicity so new employees can quickly be trained on the unit. There is a single on/off switch and temperature range settings for both the cook and hold settings. Cook and hold time can be adjusted with up/down arrows, and all these settings display on the digital readout. Because the unit can be used for a variety of product applications, it includes wire shelves, side racks, and a rib rack. All these components are made of durable stainless steel, along with the oven exterior.

record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam AR-7H-SGLPANE Description

The Alto-Shaam AR-7H-SGLPANE 2081N holding cabinet is designed to be a companion piece to the AR-7E rotisserie oven. This equipment can be used to merchandise sides to go along with rotisserie chicken or keep a batch of fresh chicken hot while another cooks. The oven is equipped with four stainless steel shelves and two stainless steel side racks that allow shelves to be adjusted on 16 positions.

Heat in this cabinet is generated by Alto-Shaam's own Halo Heat system, a method that creates gentle, even heat that won't continue to cook food or dry it out, keeping your products fresh and able to be held for hours. Thermostatic controls allow the Alto-Shaam AR-7H-SGLPANE 2081n holding cabinet's holding temperature to be adjusted from 60 to 200 degrees Fahrenheit. Four 60-watt light bulbs inside the oven illuminate held products for an attractive display, and Low-E glass prevents an excessive amount of heat from being lost through the glass.

record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam CTP6-10E Description

Increasing cooking flexibility and reducing cycle times, the Alto-Shaam CTP6-10E Combitherm CT PROformance full-size combi oven can be used for convection heating, steaming, or a combination of the two. It can hold seven half-size sheet pans or full-size steam pans on nontilt support rails. LED lighting, designed for efficiency, shines in the cabinet to provide visibility. Operators can monitor food through the cool-touch, triple-pane glass door window, and when the cycle is over, the door handle illuminates to notify users without an audible signal.

PROtouch controls on this Alto-Shaam CTP6-10E boilerless combi oven simplify operation, enabling staff members to select the cook mode with options for convection, steam, combination, or retherming. Depending on the application, users can also choose the humidity level from 0 to 100 percent to maximize flexibility and food quality. There are two power levels to choose from, and menu recipes can be uploaded and downloaded through the USB port. Cleaning the unit is straightforward because it has five selectable settings—from a 20-minute rinse cycle to a 3-hour 30-minute, heavy-duty PLUS wash cycle. A retractable hose is integrated into the front of the unit, so it can be used during cleaning.

record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam ED2-48-BLK Description

Because the Alto-Shaam ED2-48-BLK heated display case doesn't use water to keep food warm, condensation won't build up on the viewing window. This enables customers to see products inside the case without obstacles, and the glass is curved so heat reflects back into the food. The six overhead lights brighten the display and are controlled with two on and off switches. To accommodate multiple food types, this unit has two zones with separate temperature controls that radiate heat from the base.

The Alto-Shaam ED2-48-BLK countertop display case uses a patented technology called Halo Heat® that surrounds food with heat to keep it uniformly warm for hours without further cooking the food. To access the interior, there are sliding glass doors, which further enhance product viewing by creating a mirror effect. If workers need to season foods or need additional space to work, the back shelf acts as a prep space for employees.

record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam ED2-72-SS Description

Able to hold prepared dishes at safe serving temperatures for hours without affecting their quality, this Alto-Shaam ED2-72-SS heated display case uses Halo Heat—a controlled heat source that distributes low temperatures with minimal intensity to prevent foods from drying out. This unit's base is divided into two heat zones that are individually controlled with a 1-to-10 range thermostat, so items with varying heating requirements can be displayed on the same shelf. Its 695⁄16-inch-wide by 273⁄16-inch-deep by 41⁄2-inch-high well accommodates as many as five full-size pans or 10 half-size pans.

Tempered curved glass encases the front of this full-service Alto-Shaam ED2-72-SS food display case to provide a full view of illuminated dishes, while bronzed glass sliding doors and a work shelf are built onto the back to create a cafeteria-style station. Because the unit holds foods without humidity and at relatively low temperatures, condensation doesn't form on the front glass. For optimal visibility, 10 overhead bulbs highlight foods. Users can lift the tempered glass front to a 90-degree angle to streamline end-of-day cleaning, and the operator-side doors are removable and feature a clean-sweep cutout for crumb removal. To fit common decorative themes in cafeterias, recreational centers, and concession stands, its front and end panels are black. For countertop applications, this system is 72 inches wide by 445⁄16 inches deep by 301⁄8 inches high and furnished with 4-inch legs.

Product Details

  • Countertop, full-service unit
  • Accommodates 5 full-size pans, 5 third-size pans, or 3 sheet pans
  • Clear, curved tempered glass front
  • Thermostatically controlled base with 2 heat zones
  • Thermostat with 1-10 range and heat-on indicator light
  • Gentle Halo Heat technology
  • 10 overhead lights with shatterproof coated bulbs
  • On/off switches in 2 light zones
  • Bronzed glass sliding rear doors
  • Clean-sweep cutout for sliding door tracks
  • 10-in. x 60-in. operator-side work shelf
  • Stainless steel exterior with black front and end panels
  • 4-in. legs

Dimensions

  • Well: 695⁄16 in. W x 273⁄16 in. D x 41⁄2 in. H
  • Overall: 72 in. W x 445⁄16 in. D x 301⁄8 in. H

record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam ED2-72/2S-BLK Description

The Alto-Shaam ED2-72/2S-BLK countertop heated display case has two shelves for holding three full-size and three third-size hotel pans or three full-size sheet pans. Its upper shelf has thermal kinetic glass that heats food evenly, while the bottom shelf is warmed using an aluminum plate with a heat pad. To maintain ideal serving temperatures, the bronze sliding doors reflect heat onto the products. Because the full-width of the unit's front is open, it is great for self-serve applications.

Equipped with a heat guard on the front of each shelf, this Alto-Shaam ED2-72/2S-BLK self-service heated display case ensures that users won't burn themselves when grabbing food. To protect the walls and outer surface of this unit, it comes with a bumper that is environmentally friendly and recyclable. The display case uses Halo Heat® technology to hold foods, meaning it will keep products at ideal serving temperatures without continuing to cook them. When the unit is hot, a heat indicator light will shine so employees know it is working correctly.

record.body_html:
Alto-Shaam ED2-96-BLK Description

The Alto-Shaam ED2-96-BLK full-service heated display case tempts guests into buying goods by providing optimal visibility with its curved glass window and 14 interior lights. When the customer decides what product they want, employees can slide the back door open to retrieve foods. This glass also helps keep foods warm by reflecting heat back onto the products and creating a mirror effect for customers. Equipped with Halo Heat technology, this display case keeps food warm without cooking it.

Because this Alto-Shaam ED2-96-BLK countertop heated display case doesn't use water, condensation won't buildup on the front of it. This minimizes obstacles that could stop guests from viewing food products clearly and cuts down on maintenance required by employees. To protect the unit, rubber ends prevent the glass from breaking. Its bulbs are made of shatterproof glass, while the bumper reduces damage when moving it around.

 

Product Details

  • Holds 7 full-size and 7 third-size hotel pans or 4 full-size sheet pans
  • EcoSmart Halo Heat extends product life by warming without cooking
  • No water refilling required
  • (2) 10-in. x 36-in. shelves create work zone for employees
  • Heat light shows that unit is operating
  • 14 interior lights let guests visibly see products
  • On/off switches control lights
  • Light bulbs will not shatter into food
  • Curved window provides interior visibility
  • 3 zones with individual temperature controls
  • 4-in. legs elevate unit off ground
  • Black exterior
